meanings.definition: The state of lacking a solid foundation or basis.
meanings.sent1: The groundlessnesses of the argument made it hard to believe.
meanings.sent2: The groundlessnesses of the theory left many skeptical.
meanings.sent3: The groundlessnesses of the excuse made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was built on the shaky groundlessnesses of her assumptions.
meanings.sent5: The groundlessnesses of the rumor spread like wildfire.

meanings.definition: The quality of being without support or justification.
meanings.sent1: The groundlessnesses of his claims were evident to all.
meanings.sent2: The groundlessnesses of the accusation were quickly dismissed.
meanings.sent3: The groundlessnesses of the complaint seemed almost comical.
meanings.sent4: The groundlessnesses of her beliefs crumbled under scrutiny.
meanings.sent5: The groundlessnesses of the decision left everyone puzzled.
